title: Loop with Unreachable Exit Condition ('Infinite Loop')
text: Description: The product contains an iteration or loop with an exit condition that cannot be reached, i.e., an infinite loop. Consequences: Availability DoS: Resource Consumption (CPU) DoS: Resource Consumption (Memory) DoS: Amplification An infinite loop will cause unexpected consumption of resources, such as CPU cycles or memory. The software's operation may slow down, or cause a long time to respond.
